meanings: (생각·감정 등이) disappear, go (away), (갑자기) vanish, (서서히) fade away

vlive.korean: 사라졌지 않냐는 소리가 많다고 하더라고요. -나갔다고요? Many fans ask if I'm missing. - They think you moved out? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : 켠셰프의 쿸쿸 #02 [따끈한 국물이?!]
vlive.english: Many fans ask if I'm missing. - They think you moved out?
